body: Shengji, There are no floor surfaces within your energy model: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LuvHCR6YrSJxzAo1C0PaxcN9t*kHhooEBUsAXP3Yfrm7nD4aSvduC8EZjpr7WysqaZc2*EXBI*Ng5IKz2W2Vw0BclTCxAPb3/NoFloors.JPG) Therefore, plugging in a number to distFromFloorOrSrf_ or using the default number will produce no test points at which to evaluate comfort.  I would suggest either building your energy model with floor surfaces or, if there truly are no floors, plug in a Brep into the distFromFloorOrSrf_ input on the View Factor component. -Chris
